price: Shin fa, wanda ke kãre mũguwar azãba da fuskarsa (yanã zama kamar waninsa) a Rãnar ƙiyãma? Kuma a ce wa azzãlumai, "Ku ɗanɗani abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."
arabic: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِي بِوَجۡهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
